parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to draw to the layer.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate where to place the text on the layer.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate where to place the text on the layer.

parameters.name: font
parameters.description: The font name to use when drawing the text.

parameters.name: fillStyle
parameters.description: The fill style of the text, e.g. a hex colour code.

parameters.name: textAlign
parameters.description: A string indicating the alignment to use (left, center or right).

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
